The Quranic researcher is up to the Almighty: the most prominent of a bayyan is a return to the atheists that they are the first time that it is permissible to be in place, and it is prevented from the knowledge of the scholarly, He was not able to administer alive, and it may be prevented from knowing the adoption of the tribe as well.And the laughter read that in one of the two narrators about it, and the expulsion of the shroud in it was made by its hide and its stretching, and it was destroyed by the addition of them (P-123); That is: He was tossed, and he made the name of their motherâ€™s name, and he is a saying in which he told him in the doors.And the point of preventing the shroud in it is a phenomenon, and some of them refused to make it the name of their grandfather and the meaning of their eyes, it is that they were his son, and he does not appear to him.Perhaps that is the one who called for making the name of their mother, but I saw the relationships of some virtues of the Asamiyyah Al -Asamiya on the interpretation Whether it was a name for the tribe or her grandfather for the scientific and the legend, and he said: They are also in return in a normal one, but it is for a three -way to be the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the same And his numbers, and claimed that this is the truth and its crying is the name of the tribe.Its souls, and the intended is the long -term And Mujahid and devoted to the fact that one of them had been twelve and more arm.In the interpretation of Al -Kawashi, they said: The length of the long one of them was a four -arm, and one of them was taking the great rock, and it would flip it on the lives in their life.On the authority of Qatada and Ibn Abbas in the narration of Ata: The intended is the same tents and baptism and they were a captive in the rabid, so if the plant was agitated, they returned to their homes.And one said: They were the bodies of the people of the mayors and a tick that they would live in a solution and a condolence.It was said: What is intended is raised, or with a continent or the same stability and the length of life, and everyone is on the basis.
